name: PocketPod
headline: AI generated podcasts tailored to your interests
description:
PocketPod creates AI generated podcasts tailored to your interests. Whether it's a daily news update or a deep dive on a specific topic, we allow people to consume information in a familiar podcast format. 

We will be the single place people go to consume audio entertainment, while removing nearly 100% of the cost associated with producing high quality content.
tags: industry:ai-enhanced-learning; industry:consumer; industry:entertainment; industry:podcasts; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

# Daily podcasts, made for you
Never struggle to find a podcast again. PocketPods are made for you every morning, with all the stories you care about, featuring calendar & reminders integrations to get briefed on the day ahead.

generated_description:
**PocketPod: Revolutionizing Podcast Consumption with AI**

Founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's W24 batch, PocketPod is poised to change the way we consume audio content. Based in the bustling tech hub of San Francisco, this lean startup is staffed by just two employees, but it's making waves by offering AI-generated podcasts tailored specifically to your interests. Imagine waking up in the morning and having a podcast crafted for you—covering all the stories you care about. That’s PocketPod.

The company aims to be the singular destination for audio entertainment, dramatically reducing the costs associated with producing high-quality content. By leveraging AI, PocketPod allows users to stay informed, whether they’re catching up on the latest news or diving deep into niche topics.

With features like calendar and reminder integrations, PocketPod ensures you’re ready to tackle your day armed with knowledge. And you won’t need to sift through a million options—every podcast is personalized for you, every day.

They’re backed by influential partners like Y Combinator and ElevenLabs, who understand the potential of AI in content creation. 

If you're ready to transform your podcast experience and eliminate the hassle of finding the right content, check out PocketPod’s website at [pocketpod.app](https://pocketpod.app). Whether you want daily updates or deep dives into specific subjects, the future of personalized audio entertainment is just a download away.
